title: DS Ground Truth
description: Minimal ground truth schema for DS (Difficulty-Stratified) samples. Contains only fields needed for evaluation.

is_vulnerable.description: Whether the contract contains a vulnerability. Always true for DS samples.

vulnerable_functions.description: Array of function names where the vulnerability is located.

description.description: Explanation of the vulnerability, its root cause, and potential impact.

fix_description.description: Recommended remediation or fix for the vulnerability.

language.description: Smart contract language. Always 'solidity' for DS samples.
